text: CLOSE From the highly - anticipated ` ` She - Ra'' reboot to Robin Wright's reign on ` ` House of Cards,'' here's what's coming to Netflix this November. USA TODAY The final season of Netflix's ` ` House of Cards'' debuts with Robin Wright as Claire Underwood, the new President of the United States after her husband's resignation from the position. ` ` House'' is just one of the many series that examines the drama and comedy surrounding politicians in power. Here are a few more of our favorite political television shows. ( Photo : David Giesbrecht, Netflix ) Netflix is dead. Long live Netflix.
